attributes.action: Save all local hospitals that are under threat of closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many local general hospitals are due to be closed or have their services downdraded meaning people will have to travel much further for treatment that is now available locally. There are many local campaigns to save these hospitals but a single  national petition on behalf of everybody might make the government see how unpopular this policy is.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save all local hospitals that are under threat of closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15010.asp
